descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][i]New version check it out![/i][/b][/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48643/?]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky V2[/url]

[size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size]
Here are my own painted textures for skyrim.
-only changes the stars and galaxy textures
-author photos were taken with vanilla skyrim
-this is a large file and will effect very weak systems; try out the low res version if you have issues. you probably wont notice a difference in the quality


Please make sure to test all versions to find out which is best suited towards your own tastes. The colors and saturation levels of my textures will look different depending on other mods you are using.
ENB mods have the greatest effect, next would be any lighting mods.

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/34886-1-1371240636.png[/img]








[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
just simply unzip the [textures folder] and drop the entire folder into your data folder ---> C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData

[size=5]UNINSTALLATION[/size]
remove the following files from C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimDatatexturessky :
skyrimgalaxy.dds
skystars.dds




Updates/Future Plans: Make sure to check back!
-tweak existing textures
-create new textures for the moons(DONE) and alternative textures for the sky(definitely)



[size=5]MY OTHER MODS[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40785/?]Lorkhans Vision - Moons[/url]<--- Will update soon
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48643/?]Lorkhans Vision - Night Sky V2[/url]

[size=5]SUGGESTIONS[/size]
Do you use Climates of Tamriel? Then check out Prod80's weather patch!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799/]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch - Fog Rain Overcast[/url]
It adjusts Foggy, Rainy and Overcast weather systems in ways that improve the look and feel of Climates of Tamriel, without straying to far from its original intention. Dont forget to endorse!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25022/?]Shooting Stars[/url] by isoku
Another great mod!

[color=red]WARNING: YOU MAY FIND YOURSELF LOOKING UP AT THE NIGHT SKY MORE OFTEN THAN THE GROUND. I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INJURIES THAT MAY OCCUR. THANK YOU. :D[/color]

Do not distribute this mod without my permission! You can however link this mod wherever you want. If you enjoy this mod then spread the word! :)
author: Doubloonz
